tags: we wish you a metal christmas
summary: About Aggretsuko: we wish you a metal Christmas
title: About Aggretsuko: we wish you a metal Christmas
body:
So, the movie came out yesterday, and there’s one scene that I found subtly amazing. For anyone who hasn’t watched it, I will leave everything else below. For anyone who hasn’t watched Aggretsuko, I would recommend it.

The scene I’m talking about is right at the very beginning, continuing on immediately from where Season 1 closed on: Retsuko and Haida, talking to each other in hospital.

Here, we learn that Haida has confessed his feelings for Retsuko and… she rejects him.

We then spend the rest of the movie watching the guy nursing a broken heart and continuing to hold a candle for her. There’s other things going on, of course, but here’s the thing: the thing that Haida missed, that I missed when I watched the movie and only realised later.

“I can only be a friend right now.”

Right now.

Retsuko has just come out of a relationship that she was heavily emotionally invested in. She had been in the honeymoon phase and head over heels for Resasuke, believing that he was ‘the one’.

She doesn’t seem like someone who would get over a breakup all that quickly. We don’t really see her outside of the office environment, where she’s not going to show if it’s bugging her, and when we do see her outside the office; she’s obsessing over Instagram, which could easily be interpreted as her distracting herself.

The point is: when Haida confessed his feeling for Retsuko, she was in no state to be anything more than friends. So, rather than throwing herself into another relationship, which for that very reason would not work out, she sets her boundaries. It’s being mature and making choices that focus on improving your own health (physical, mental or emotional) before committing to something like that again.

Haida doesn’t notice that because he is -understandably- caught up in the sting of rejection. We don’t really hear the rest of the conversation, Retsuko could have explained herself better, but Haida probably wouldn’t have heard her if she had. Fenneko? She overhears the whole thing, but it seems like she’s overcome with sympathy for Haida that she probably stopped listening as well.

Not to say that they were doing it intentionally, but when you get hurt, or feel sympathy for someone who’s just been hurt, I at least find that I get a sort of tunnel vision. It’s almost self-preservation, trying to stop any more pain from hitting you. In that state of mind, it is so easy to miss the little things.

Now, this isn’t to say that Retsuko does have feelings for Haida, because she may very well simply see him as a good friend at work. But that’s not what that particular scene felt like to me.

Or, maybe I’m thinking too much into this.
body_abstract: So, the movie came out yesterday, and there’s one scene that I found subtly amazing. For anyone who hasn’t watched it, I will leave everything else below. For anyone who hasn’t watched Aggretsuko, I would recommend it.

I'm Javi but you can call me Silver, I'm a chilean girl that loves to draw, more dedicated to the cartoon style. English is my second language so I can mess it up sometimes. I'm a Illustrator student, currently on my final year, you can visit my art blog if youre interested to see my work. I ship Silver and Crystal [Specialjewelshipping] thats the meaning of my username. Besides my blogs I also moderate fnaf-sxc, silent-redemption, sonic-game and justinfinite. Also infidget week on twitter. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I can be your angle or yuor devil. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Please don't repost my stuff without permission or proper credit, thank you ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I don't take requests, sometimes I accept suggestions, my commissions are open. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Please tell me if you need something tagged so you can blacklist it.

summary: I saw the Netflix christmas special of Aggretsuko. I liked it, is like another episode, no shorter or longer, is the same aura...
caption:
I saw the Netflix christmas special of Aggretsuko. I liked it, is like another episode, no shorter or longer, is the same aura of the series.

…….but my heart wanted more, my shipper heart wanted more for my son ;A;
I want to believe there is hope for the ship ™ on Season 2

Take this doodle I made and watch the special if youre interested pls, thenk you

summary: Rambling #2: Aggretsuko And The Social Media Machine
title: Rambling #2: Aggretsuko And The Social Media Machine
body:
Do you go cray-cray using social media? I ramble about Aggretsuko And The Social Media Machine in my second rambling post. Check it out!

It’s that beautiful time of the year again.

Crystalline snowflakes falling onto the icy covered ground and onto the spindles of coniferous trees. Warm gingerbread cookies carefully taken out of the oven with its sweet scent wafting in the air. Coloured packages wrapped up in ribbon sitting under the Christmas tree donned in garland and ornaments.

The holidays are a time to spend with your…

View On WordPress

blog.name: ask-haida-anything
blog.title: Haida, That Guy Who Has That Crush On Retsuko...
blog.description: (This is an aggretsuko ask blog, come drop by and leave an ask!) hey there, you probably know who I am..that one hyena who has a crush on a particular someone..(and heh if I you’re gonna ask nsfw questions, please nothing too obscene) (Header art by; Blue-chica)

summary: Have a good day, Haida! I support you! Never think you're pathetic, be proud or yourself! I love you! <3
question: Have a good day, Haida! I support you! Never think you're pathetic, be proud or yourself! I love you! <3
answer: “Heh thanks, Christmas coming up and all..I suppose it’s a time to feel good. Just hope I can ask retsuko out to like a Christmas Eve party or something, still kinda feel bad about what happened at the hospital but I don’t blame her for it.”

reblog.comment: “Heh thanks, Christmas coming up and all..I suppose it’s a time to feel good. Just hope I can ask retsuko out to like a Christmas Eve party or something, still kinda feel bad about what happened at the hospital but I don’t blame her for it.”
